name: IPPG2
description: IPPG2 is the direct continuation of IPPG, a game where you dodge red blocks to reach a flag using boxes, teleporters, keys, etc... Now it has 120 levels, 12 adventure levels, 10 bosses, 12 minigames, a shop with skins, easter eggs, a progress system, and more. #puzzle #hard #shooter #retro #other
